intension: Design a Good Luck card with a bright gradient and various lucky symbols, such as the clover leaf, gold orbit and stars, to wish someone success and motivation. The card includes the message 'Good Luck, Jen. I'm right behind you. You've got what it takes. Love You.'
globalcaption: The image features a pink background with a heart-shaped message that reads
keywords: luck, magic, shine, symbol, wish, worship, pink, heart, leaf, clover, gold, orbit, stars, post, instagram, ig, insta, gradient, pastel

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a white background with a large heart in the center. The heart is surrounded by a few stars, with one star located to the left of the heart, another to the right, and a third one slightly above the heart. The arrangement of the stars and the heart creates a visually appealing and simple design

objlayer.objcaption: The image is a white background with a bright yellow light in the center. The light appears to be shining through the white background, creating a clean and minimalist look

body.text: I\u2019m right behind you. You\u2019ve got what it takes.
